external_games.name: Tuffy the Corgi and the Tower of Bones
Tuffy the Corgi and the Tower of Bones

name: Tuffy the Corgi and the Tower of Bones
summary: Tuffy the Corgi shall climb the Tower of Bones. We can't tell you why: that would be a spoiler. Get to the top. Try to pick up all 108 bones along the way! If you touch one enemy or spike, it's game over. Be careful!
